item.description: its been a while since we had a Karaoke event. Last time we had some true surprises! Let's get together and do it again. We're doing dinner beforehand at New Shanghai. RSVP on that meet up too if you want to join us for dinner. We'll be in a private room so we'll need to RSVP in order to reserve a properly sized room. Please RSVP responsibly.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the meet up group

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Karaoke!!!
